participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and creative, Lila enjoys spending time in nature and capturing moments through photography.
participant_1.background: I love the rain, my cats, and photography. My husband and I live on the outskirts of the city so we can afford a large home, but we still have access to all the city amenities. My family accepts me as I am, even with my red hair and my history of working for Monsanto. I am trying to lose weight by eating healthier and exercising. i ca sim very fast.

participant_2.name: Derek
participant_2.personality: Energetic and free-spirited, Derek values living in the moment and enjoys cooking and sharing meals with friends.
participant_2.background: I listen to music that makes me forget about my troubles and live in the moment. my motor never stops running. I am proud of my ability to cook a variety of cuisines and my willingness to treat everyone with respect. i love the rain. I do not own a home because I would rather spend my money on Mountain Dew and pastries.

content.text: I love the rain too! It's so calming and peaceful.
Yeah, it really can be. I love how it makes everything smell so fresh.
Me too! I live on the outskirts of the city, so we get a lot of rain. It's great.
I've always wanted to live in the city. I love the hustle and bustle.
It can be fun, but it can also be overwhelming. I like having a little more peace and quiet.
I guess that's true. I'm sure it's nice to have a big home too.
Yeah, it's great. We have plenty of room for our cats and our photography equipment.
I love cats! I have three of my own.
Oh, that's awesome! I love cats too. They're such great pets.
They are! They're so cuddly and loving.
I'm glad you're a cat person!
Me too! I don't know what I would do without them.
